summary: The third film of a five-part art-installation epic -- it's part-zombie movie, part-gangster film.
cast: Richard Serra|Matthew Barney|Aimee Mullins|Paul Brady|Terry Gillespie|Mike Bocchetti|David Edward Campbell|James Pantoleon|Jim Tooey|Nesrin Karanouh|Peter Donald Badalamenti II|The Mighty Biggs|Gwendolyn Bucci|Heather Coker|James Drescher|Todd Christian Hunter|Joseph P. McDonnell|Roger Miret|Courtney Patton|Alexandra Sawyier|Jerry Skids|Kerry Stichweh|Tara Stiles|Sofie Zamchick|Fast Ali
title: Cremaster 3
